comments.body:
we've had trouble with statics on bluepill. Using a global variable has been our workaround.

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/8703a34f9d998ff33eae3124bd634e663aed252c/tensorflow/lite/micro/benchmarks/keyword_benchmark.cc#L48-L50

If we can get the micro_speech test to pass on bluepill, I don't care if we use a static or a global.
I've verified this is working (I believe https://github.com/google/stm32_bare_lib/commit/aaabdeb0d6098322a0874b29f6ed547a39b3929f should have helped) so I've left it as a function-level static.
